artist: Artist: Antonio Clavé; Author: François Rabelais
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: unbound volume with paper-covered cardboard slipcase and paper-covered cardboard cover, both with similar abstract designs with birds in mustard yellow, lavender and white on black ground; thick paper interior cover; loose sheets with text and abstracted images including birds, chickens, various animals and figures; text printed in purple and black
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to Mia, 2017
title: Gargantua
